definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Participant(s) who fail to produce valid identity documents will not be permitted to participate in the race.
sentences.chinese: 未能出示有效身份证明文件的参赛者，不得出赛。

sentences.english: In many countries, a driving license is a valid proof of indentity .
sentences.chinese: 驾驶执照在很多国家是有效的身份证明。

sentences.english: And the type of proof that the rabbinate prefers is peculiarly unsuited to Jewish life in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 而他们偏好的身份证明，是美籍犹太人非常不适应的。

sentences.english: Remember to bring your donor card, driver's license or two other forms of ID.
sentences.chinese: 记得带上献血证，驾驶证或其他两种身份证明。

sentences.english: I used my driver's license as identification.
sentences.chinese: 我用驾驶执照作为身份证明。

sentences.english: And when customers sign a contract, they have to produce some form of identification.
sentences.chinese: 当顾客签约接受服务，他们必须拿出一些身份证明。

sentences.english: We will require proof of identity of both the original and substituted passenger to ensure authenticity of the request.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要原购票人和现购票人同时出示身份证明。

sentences.english: One’s own sense of identity and self-worth are reflected in the lover’s reactions.
sentences.chinese: 自己的身份证明和价值都要靠情人的反应来体现。

sentences.english: Yes，sir.But I need your address and some identification.
sentences.chinese: 收的，先生，不过我们需要您的地址和身份证明。

sentences.english: Yes，sir. But I need your address and some identification.
sentences.chinese: 收的，先生，不过我们需要您的地址和身份证明。

sentences.english: Passenger said "I have waited for an hour already to get the temporary ID.
sentences.chinese: 一名旅客说“我等了一个小时才拿到临时身份证明。

sentences.english: Take your admission ticket and photo ID to the test center.
sentences.chinese: 携带准考证和带有照片的身份证明到考场。

sentences.english: Tip Two:Do Show Your ID Card All The Time.
sentences.chinese: 随时随地出示身份证明，否则寸步难行。

sentences.english: A declarer shall provide his identify certificate or its registration certificate.
sentences.chinese: 集中申报人应提供其身份证明或注册登记证明。

sentences.english: I checked the photo identification of the Grantor;
sentences.chinese: 我检查了委托人的相片身份证明。

sentences.english: Passengers looking to ride on China's high speed trains will now be required to show identification.
sentences.chinese: 希望乘坐中国高铁的旅客现在必须提供身份证明。

definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
